venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Ladies & Gentlemen, you are invited to Boston’s official Australia Day Party for 2012. For the second year running it will be held at the Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant on Saturday 28th January and is set to be the best yet. We have Australian music, Aussie beer, meat pies, raffles, auctions, giveaways as well as the annual ‘Peter Garrett-off’. 

Festivities kick off at 1pm and will go long into the night. Get there early as space may run out.

Remember to get your Aussie costume together as there are prizes for the best dressed! 

All welcome and encouraged to fill their boots regardless of nationality. $10 entry to the best party of the year!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day Party
